attributes.action: Not to Re-enter the EU without Public Support
attributes.additional_details: It appears this Goverment is against the majority of people in this Country and seems not to care what we want, we wish to remind them they work for us.
attributes.background: Prevent the UK from re-entering the EU without Public Support going against the will of the People and previous democratic vote.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has not said that it plans to re-enter the EU.
